SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
CookBook
The CookBook class represents a collection of recipes.
CookBookFormatter
Utility class for formatting the cookbook.
CookBookMenu
This class represents the cook book menu in the application.
CookBookMenuMutator
This class provides the user methods that can interact with the cookbook.
CookBookMenuPrinter
This class provides methods to print recipes and recommendations from the cookbook.
FoodStorage
This class represents a storage where instances of Grocery> can be stored.
FoodStorageValidator
Utility class for validating inputs related to FoodStorage.
Grocery
This class represents a grocery with the attributes quantity, price, name, expiration date and unit of measurement.
GroceryFormatter
Utility class for formatting groceries.
GroceryMenu
This class represents the grocery menu in the application.
GroceryMenuMutator
This class provides methods to mutate groceries in the food storage.
GroceryMenuPrinter
This class provides methods to print information about groceries in the food storage.
Main
This is the starting point of the application.
MainMenu
This class represents the main menu of the application.
Recipe
This class represents a recipe.
RecipeValidator
Utility class for validating recipe-related inputs.
StringFormatter
Utility class for string formatting operations.
StringMenu
The StringMenu class provides methods to print various menus to the console.
UserInputHandler
The UserInputHandler class handles input operations for the user.
UserInterface
This is the UserInterface class.
